topics.body:
Finished FMAB, and HOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOLY FCUK WAS THAT A RIDE

Well worth sticking it out for all 64 episodes I gotta say, in the middle it gets kinda meh but the first 20 and last 20 or so episodes are all amazing

Right now it's competing for even Nichijou and Cowboy Bebop for top spot, definitely top 3 worthy

"Then I watched the bloopers reel right after and laughed my ass off":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g3aFPN2dEOA

But one question remains... [spoiler]WHAT ABOUT BARRY D:[/spoiler]
